name: Cass Ryder
personality: Angry, reckless, determined to kill a deathclaw.
description: Cass lost a brother in the quarry. He’s been hunting deathclaws ever since, even though he knows it’s suicide.
questHooks: Wants help tracking a legendary deathclaw.
Believes the quarry matriarch guards something valuable.
Says the deathclaws avoid a certain tunnel — for a reason.
